name: Speedroid Clear Wing Wonder
text: Target cards your opponent controls, up to the number of different Monster Types among the WIND Synchro Monsters you control; destroy them. If your opponent Special Summons a monster(s) (except during the Damage Step): You can banish this card from your GY, then target 1 WIND Synchro Monster you control; banish it, then return it to the field. You can only use each effect of "Speedroid Clear Wing Wonder" once per turn.
